thread.title: Kansas City Royals beat Houston Astros 5-4 in Game 2: Live updates recap
thread.title_full: Kansas City Royals beat Houston Astros 5-4 in Game 2: Live updates recap | OregonLive.com

author: JD Humburg | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Kansas City Royals beat Houston Astros 5-4 in Game 2: Live updates recap
text:
The Kansas City Royals and Houston Astros resume their best-of-five American League Division Series on Friday with Game 2 in Kansas City.
The Astros beat the Royals 5-2 in Game 1 . Colby Rasmus and George Springer homered and Collin McHugh allowed two runs in six innings to earn the win.
Can the Royals bounce back and even the series at a game apiece, or will Houston take a commanding 2-0 lead? Get live updates in the box score below:
Here are details on how to follow Friday's game.
What : Houston Astros at Kansas City Royals in ALDS Game 2
Where : Kauffman Stadium, Kansas City
When : Friday, October 9, at 12:45 p.m. PT/3:45 p.m. ET
What TV channel : TV on FS1, radio on KMTT (910 AM) in Portland area
Online : Listen at ESPNRadio.com
Pitching matchup : Kansas City's Johnny Cueto (11-13, 3.44 ERA) vs. Houston's Scott Kazmir (7-11, 3.10 ERA)
Playoff schedule : Bookmark our MLB scoreboard for postseason scores and schedules.
